source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_SEQ_00<tab>Yugiri has made her choice, and so have you.
target: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_SEQ_00<tab>ユヅカ代官屋敷付近のユウギリは、作戦の仔細を確認したいようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_SEQ_01<tab>Zenos yae Galvus has come to Doma, and Yugiri has resolved, over the protestations of your comrades, to assassinate him. You alone have agreed to support her in this endeavor, and so she shares with you Zenos's itinerary─how the vessel bearing him and his escort will come to the docks east of the Moon Gates, and how, after disembarking, they will continue towards Yuzuka Manor. The docks themselves are not an ideal location for an ambush, however, so the two of you split up to search for suitable hiding places.
target: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_SEQ_01<tab>管轄地の視察をするため、ゼノスがドマにやってきた。この機に乗じて、ユウギリはゼノス暗殺を計画。ユヅカ代官屋敷の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA32201 /var>」で見渡し、身をひそめる場所を探そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_SEQ_02<tab>You find a spot near the manor which should afford you a clear view of the docks. All that remains is to wait for the crown prince to arrive, and to attempt to take him unawares. Should you fail, you will have no choice but to engage him in open combat. But then a part of you would like that very much...
target: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_SEQ_02<tab>身をひそめるのに適した場所を見つけた。戦いの支度を整え、ユヅカ代官屋敷の「ユウギリ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_SEQ_03<tab>As before at the Reach, Zenos is a force of nature, relentless and unstoppable. Yet you have grown stronger since last you met, and for a time it seems as though you may have a chance...until your foe elects to bring a new katana to bear against you. At once, his body begins to crackle with a crimson energy, which bursts forth and fells both Yugiri and the viceroy's few remaining soldiers. You endure a moment longer, but soon join them in defeat.
target: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_SEQ_03<tab>ユウギリとともに身をひそめ、ゼノス暗殺を実行した。腕を上げた冒険者は奮戦したものの、妖刀アメノハバキリを得たゼノスを仕留めることはできなかった。どうにか、ユヅカ代官屋敷付近から撤退しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_SEQ_04<tab>As he stands over you in judgment, Zenos at last recognizes you as the champion of the savages in Ala Mhigo. Discarding his damaged helmet, he implores you to live on, to endure, to grow stronger, and to face him once more, before whirling about and putting an end to a last desperate attempt by Yugiri to kill him. He advances to finish her off, but pauses when confronted by a group of armed villagers, as well as Gosetsu and Alisaie, who are determined to save the ninja's life. It is a touching display of defiance, but having tasted the viceroy's might, you know that even with such numbers, they do not stand a chance. Nevertheless, Zenos withdraws without a word, leaving you and your comrades free to withdraw to safety.
target: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_SEQ_04<tab>かけつけたドマの民や仲間たちとともに撤退することができた。東龍鱗橋付近の「アリゼー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_SEQ_05<tab>It would seem that Yugiri owes her preservation to one Alphinaud Leveilleur, for it was he who convinced the others to rush to your defense. Alisaie takes great pleasure in describing his panic─as does Gosetsu in observing that she herself was no picture of calm...
target: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_SEQ_05<tab>アリゼーと話した。どうやら、彼女と烈士庵へと到着したアルフィノが、救助隊を編成してくれたらしい。奇しくもゼノスの望みどおり、窮地から脱することはできたが、彼を討ち果たすには、まだ力をつける必要がありそうだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_TODO_00<tab>Search for a place to lie in wait.
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_GOSETSU_100_000<tab>Zenos will fall, but not to a desperate knife in the dark. We will need to plan and prepare, and she has done neither.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_GOSETSU_100_000暗殺を無理と申しているのではござらん。
ただ、拙者が主の言葉から感じ取った核心は、
別にあるということでござる。
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_000<tab>よし、ではまず、想定されているゼノスの移動経路についてだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_001<tab>He will depart Doma Castle by ship and approach the Moon Gates. The magitek field will be deactivated briefly, allowing his vessel to pass. It will then continue on to these very docks, where he and his entourage will disembark.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_001奴は船でドマ城を出発。
魔導障壁を一部解除して航行し、
この船着場に到着する予定らしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_002<tab>As you can see, this area is not ideal for an ambush. Wide open, multiple avenues of escape. The manor is better suited to our needs.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_002……しかし、見てのとおり、ここは開けていて暗殺には不向き。
我々は、ゼノスが移動するのを待ち、
「ユヅカ代官屋敷」付近で仕掛けるべきだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_003<tab>Let us split up and search for suitable hiding places.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_003ゆえに、)) (( )) 02 /var>殿……
まずは、我々がひそむのによさそうな場所を探そう。
手分けすれば、時間はそうかからぬはずだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Surrounded by walls and deserted, this location appears to be ideal for concealment...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_SYSTEM_000_010壁に囲まれ、ひっそりとした場所だ。
身をひそめるのに適しているかもしれない……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_012<tab>Hmm... From the roof, we would have a clear view of the docks...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_012……ああ、よい場所だ。
屋根の上から、船着場を見ることもできよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_013<tab>It is settled. We shall lie in wait here until Zenos arrives.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_013では、ここにひそんで機会を待つ……。
ゼノスが到着したら、まずは私が仕掛けよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_014<tab>As discussed, if all goes to plan, he shall fall with my first blow. If not, then the two of us will have to engage him in open combat.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_014無論、初手必殺のつもりでいくが、どうなるかはわからない。
貴殿は、適宜加勢を頼む。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_015<tab>His escort is of no consequence, which means that we will have a two-to-one advantage. Nevertheless, he is not to be underestimated...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_015最悪、ゼノスと真っ向勝負になることも想定し、
準備を整えておいてくれ。
……私たちで、必ずやり遂げよう！

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_020<tab>All that remains is to wait. I trust that you are ready?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_000_020準備は万全だろうか？
よければ、ここで息をひそめ、ゼノスの到着を待つとしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ISSE_000_035<tab>It's all right. Here, have some water...
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_GOSETSU_000_040<tab>'Tis naught that will not heal with time.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_GOSETSU_000_040どうにか全員無事でござるな。
ならば、よし。

source:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ALISAIE_000_050I don't think we were followed...
Gods... I have no idea what was going through that man's head, but I am heartily glad he decided to leave.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ALISAIE_000_050追手は……来ていないみたいね。
あちらにも何か考えがあるんでしょうけれど、正直助かるわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ALISAIE_000_051<tab>Oh, and don't thank us. Thank Alphinaud. He's at the House of the Fierce, patiently awaiting your gratitude.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ALISAIE_000_051ああ、お礼ならアルフィノに言ってよね。
あいつ、今は烈士庵で待ってるから。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ALISAIE_000_052<tab>You should've seen the way he turned pale when he heard about Yugiri's plan─and how <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> of all people had decided to help her. He was in such a panic, barking orders, calling for a squadron to be assembled─
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ALISAIE_000_052エーテライトの件で呼び寄せたんだけど、
到着早々、あなたたちが暗殺にいったかもって知らされてね。
青い顔して、救助隊を編成したのよ。

TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_GOSETSU_000_053青い顔をしておったのは、おぬしも同じでござろう？
ふたりそろって、鬼のごとき気迫でせまってきおって！

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ALISAIE_000_054<tab>I was rather composed, as I recall. Though that is neither here nor there...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ALISAIE_000_054…………何にせよ。
あなたもユウギリも、村の人たちも無事でよかった。
一度おちついて、建て直しましょ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>Zenos yae Galvus! You will die by my hand!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_BATTLETALK_001_001雑兵め、邪魔だッ！
ゼノス……貴様を、ここで討つッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>First you must kill my men. You <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> do that, can you not?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_001_002初撃すら決まらぬ者に興味はない。
俺の獲物は……こちらのにするか。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YOTSUYU_BATTLETALK_001_003<tab>What are you doing, you fools!? There are only two of them!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YOTSUYU_BATTLETALK_001_003なんで来たんだか……。
何者だか知らないが、愚かだねぇ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>Hm. How much longer must you make me wait?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_002_001久方ぶりの狩りだ……。
もう少しは、興じさせてくれような？

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>Very well. I suppose you have earned this...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_003_001…………ハ。
試し斬りをする程度の価値はあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>This is not a game, you twisted, arrogant bastard!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_BATTLETALK_003_002また遊びのつもりか！？
許さない……主と同胞の仇は、私がッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YUGIRI_BATTLETALK_003_004<tab>No! I can still fight, I can still...still...
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>Well done, beast. You have earned the right to look on the Ame<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Habakiri.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_004_001妖刀、アメノハバキリ……
抜かせたお前に、褒美をやろう……！

TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_YOTSUYU_BATTLETALK_004_002なんて力……ッ！
巻き込まれちゃたまらないよ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>You're better than most, I'll grant you that. But not good enough. This ends now.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA322_02498_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_005_001よく続いているが、面白みのない……。
飽きた、終わりにするぞ。
